data.name: ComiPo!: Blazer & Gakuran
data.detailed_description:
Back to school for your ComiPo! characters, with the blazer collection, staple of the Japanese mid graders, and strict gakuran for formal occasions.

Blazer & Gakuran was created due to popular demand of Japanese fan, and also include special color patterns based on their suggestions.
This will certainly give more variety to your school manga, but also some variation useful in more military contexts.

This pack contains:
  • 13 blazer variations for boys
  • 18 blazer variations for girls
  • 13 gakuran for boys
  • Special color variations based on fan suggestions.
